categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems starship classes
Category:Huppla Pasa Tisc Shipwrights Collective products

nodes.text: The Geonosian transport was a model of landing craft donated by the Geonosians to the Confederate Navy during the Clone Wars.

Mostly used for surface-to-surface transport, the craft was also capable of space flight. Its hyperdrive was limited to short jumps, which was just enough to escape pursuing fleets during planetary evacuations.
